title: Walmart Reels From Juneteenth Snafu
description:
Today is Friday, June 17, and we're looking at Walmart vs. Target.


*Clarification: "The emancipation of formerly enslaved people in Galveston, TX occurred on June 19, 1865. A year later, the first anniversary celebration was held."

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
